body: TRANSLATE WHEN?
Translate please

@Tripple-H yeah, netorare "Cuckold", normally has to do when the guy has his girl stolen by another, netori is when the protagonist steals the girl, so you're telling me the prota is the sister, because she stole the man -her brother- from his girlfriend, because to me, the guy is having a freaking hard time getting controlled by his sister  and wanted to end the relationship)
@gtvo19 it's called Netori and for some reason there isn't a tag for it on nhentai, making it easy to not notice the few good manga because of the wrong tag... I always search "english -netorare"

Well, this is of course reverse NTR, because the sister stole the girl's lover. If you reverse the genders (and the sister is a guy and the brother a girl, and girlfriend a boy), you'll understand the ntr tag. (but since the boy didn't lose anything, and usually men tend to empathize with male protagonist then you give a fuck if the girlfriend has lost her lover.)
Re : Who the F tagged this as NTR??  It's a 100% normal and happy story.  11/10 as always!
Yay!  My favorite Yandere returns........  >NTR  -   literally WTF??
